questions.author: Chris C
questions.content: How to uninstall npm modules in node js?
questions.notes: As commonly known, any npm module can be installed by running a simple command: npm install <module_name>. I have installed a few modules that I do not use anymore and I just want to get them off.

questions.author: Chris C
questions.content: How to fix http redirects with Nginx?
questions.notes: I have a webpage where http redirects are a bit broken. The current behavior is this: www.example.com, example.com, http://www.example.com, http://example.com, https://www.example.com all gets redirected to https://www.example.com
